de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.nodes
Class ActionOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      com.jme3.scene.Node
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.nodes.ActionOptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.asset.Asset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class ActionOptions
extends com.jme3.scene.Node

Provides the buttons that surround the player units to enble the available actions.

Constructor Detail

ActionOptions

Method Detail

animateAction

public void animateAction(float tpf)
This method animates the various icon movements. First the position of an icon is being set a bit towards the target position depending on the tpf. Then the icon is scaled a bit towards the target scale. The method is being called repeatedly from the games simpleUpdate until the target position is reached.

Parameters:
tpf - time per frame

initMarker

public void initMarker()
This method initializes the position and scale of all icons.

triggerFight

public void triggerFight()
This method moves the fight icon to the top center of the unit marker and hides all the other. This happens to indicate fight.

triggerTrade

public void triggerTrade()
This method moves the trade icon to the top center of the unit marker and hides all the other. This happens to indicate trade.

triggerMove

public void triggerMove()
This method moves the move icon to the top center of the unit marker and hides all the other. This happens to indicate movement.

unfoldOptions

public void unfoldOptions(PlayerStates ps)
This method shows all the options by moving them to their specified positions and scaling them to factor of one.

foldOptions

public void foldOptions()
This method hides all the action options by moving them to the center and scaling them to factor of zero.
